name: gomft
tagline: A command-line utility for inspecting NTFS master file table data
description: GoMFT provides a command-line interface for reading and processing NTFS Master File Table (MFT) entries. Useful for forensics and investigations in file integrity or recovery cases.

features.title: Mft Parsing
features.description: Read and process NTFS Master File Table entries for forensic analysis

features.title: Forensic Investigation
features.description: Extract file metadata, timestamps, and attributes from NTFS volumes

features.title: File Recovery
features.description: Identify deleted or hidden files through MFT analysis

features.title: Integrity Analysis
features.description: Verify file system integrity and detect anomalies in file records

features.title: Command
features.description: Efficient CLI tool for scripting and automated forensic workflows

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export MFT data in various formats for further analysis and reporting

features.title: Timeline Construction
features.description: Build file system timelines from MFT timestamps for incident response

features.title: Cross
features.description: Analyze NTFS volumes from Linux, macOS, or Windows systems
